tasks.label: Applet_BuildJava
tasks.command:
cd ${workspaceFolder:OZAppletViewer}; Remove-Item -Path bin -Recurse -Force; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path bin
 Get-ChildItem -Path src -Recurse -Filter *.java | ForEach-Object { $_.FullName } | Set-Content -Path source_paths.txt
 javac --% -encoding UTF8 -d bin -cp build/activation.jar;build/mail.jar;build/jhall.jar;build/netscape.jar;build/uk.co.mmscomputing.imageio.tiff.jar;../../lib/java/dom4j-1.6.1.jar;../../lib/java/jaxen-1.1.6.jar;../../lib/java/log4j.jar;../../lib/java/ozc_js.jar;../../lib/java/ozsfw90.jar -sourcepath "src;src_lib" -source 1.8 -target 1.8 @"source_paths.txt"
 Remove-Item -Path source_paths.txt; Copy-Item -Path src/resource/image -Destination bin/resource -Recurse -Force
